name: Quick White Bean & Kale Soup

ingredients.name: Marinara Sauce Mix or Pizza Seasoning
Vegetable Broth Mix
ingredients.additionalInstruction: or broth mix of your choice

preparation: Place carrots in Multipurpose Steamer; stir in 1 can beans, Marinara Sauce Mix, broth mix, salt and 1⁄4 cup warm water. Cover; microwave on high for 8 min or until carrots are tender.
Using Ground Meat Separator, mash carrots and beans (there should still be some visible chunks). Stir in 6 cups of boiling water and remaining can of beans. Microwave, uncovered, on high, for 6 min.
Carefully remove from microwave and stir in kale. Cover and let stand until wilted, 1–2 min. Taste and add more topper, if desired.
tips: Need more protein in your plant-based diet? Swap white beans for lentils. One cup of lentils contains 40% more protein.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with a small dinner roll and 2 cups leafy greens with 1 tbsp Epicure Dressing.

products.name: Marinara Sauce Mix
summary: A simple, kid-friendly sauce that speaks volumes, Marinara is packed with the bright flavor of garlic, oregano, and basil. Pair it with your fave pasta and use it as a base layer for delicious homemade pizza.

products.name: Pizza Seasoning (1002291)
summary: In a world of complex gastronomy, pizza is a testament to the simple pleasures we all crave. Now you can get it by the spoonful! This blend delivers the nostalgic flavours and feeling of eating pizza, with notes of basil, oregano, garlic, tomato, and green bell peppers with loads of Parmesan. And yes, there is a mild whisper of chilli, too!

products.name: Vegetable Broth Mix
summary: Make a tasty vegetable broth in a matter of seconds! Same garden-fresh flavor as making it from scratch—just add water!

products.name: Multipurpose Steamer
summary: Like a casserole dish in design & purpose, this cooking utensil is made of silicone & has a 14-cup capacity.

products.name: Ground Meat Separator
summary: Break up ground meat much easier & faster with this purpose-built tool.
